questions.question: What does Joey say is the reason he wanted to be a veterinarian when he was little?
options: He found out he had to put his hands into cows and stuff
He loved animals and wanted to work with them
He thought it would be an easy job
questions.correct_answer: He found out he had to put his hands into cows and stuff
questions.explanation: Joey mentions that when he was little, he wanted to be a veterinarian, but then he found out you had to put your hands into cows and stuff.

questions.question: What is the name of the talent agency where Joey has an audition?
options: Days of Our Lives Talent Agency
questions.correct_answer: Estelle Leonard Talent Agency
questions.explanation: The scene takes place at the Estelle Leonard Talent Agency, where Joey has an audition.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman Ross mentions who is the curator of moths and other winged things?
questions.correct_answer: Not mentioned by name
questions.explanation: Ross mentions a woman at the museum who is the curator of moths and other winged things, but does not mention her name.

questions.question: What does Rachel say she will not be doing with Ross?
questions.correct_answer: Dating
questions.explanation: Rachel tells Ross that she will not be dating him.

questions.question: What does Russ do for a living?
questions.correct_answer: He is a periodontist
questions.explanation: Russ tells the gang that he is a periodontist, which is a doctor of gums.

questions.question: What is the name of the character Joey plays on Days of Our Lives?
questions.correct_answer: Dr. Drake Ramore
questions.explanation: Joey tells the gang that he will be playing the role of Dr. Drake Ramore, a neurosurgeon, on Days of Our Lives.

questions.question: Why does Fun Bobby break up with Monica?
options: Because she is drinking too much
Because he is not strong enough to be in a codependent relationship
Because he fell off the wagon
Because she is not fun enough
questions.correct_answer: Because he is not strong enough to be in a codependent relationship
questions.explanation: Fun Bobby breaks up with Monica because he is not strong enough to be in a codependent relationship, implying that Monica has a drinking problem.

questions.question: What does Phoebe think Rachel sees in Russ?
options: That he reminds her of Ross
questions.correct_answer: That he reminds her of Ross
questions.explanation: Phoebe thinks that Rachel sees in Russ a reminder of Ross, which is why she is dating him.

questions.question: What does Joey decide to do about the casting lady's offer?
options: He decides to sleep with her to get the part
He decides not to sleep with her and to audition fairly
He decides to report her to the authorities
questions.correct_answer: He decides not to sleep with her and to audition fairly
questions.explanation: Joey decides that he does not want to sleep with the casting lady to get the part, and instead wants to audition fairly.

questions.question: What is the name of the bar where the gang hangs out?
questions.correct_answer: Central Perk
questions.explanation: The gang hangs out at Central Perk, which is their favorite coffee shop.

questions.question: What does Chandler compare Ross's problem with Russ to?
questions.correct_answer: A card game
questions.explanation: Chandler compares Ross's problem with Russ to a card game, saying that Ross is like a card sharp, while Russ is like a card shark.

questions.question: What does Monica use to make Fun Bobby's stories more amusing?
questions.correct_answer: Liquor
questions.explanation: Monica uses liquor to make Fun Bobby's stories more amusing, as she finds them boring when he is sober.

questions.question: What does Joey's agent tell him about the audition?
options: That he needs to sleep with the casting lady to get the part
That he needs to audition again
That he is not right for the part
questions.correct_answer: That he needs to sleep with the casting lady to get the part
questions.explanation: Joey's agent tells him that he needs to sleep with the casting lady to get the part, which Joey is not comfortable with.

options: That she is in love with Russ
That she is just having fun with Russ
That she is not interested in Ross
That she is not really anything at Ross anymore
questions.correct_answer: That she is not really anything at Ross anymore
questions.explanation: Rachel tells Ross that she is not really anything at him anymore, implying that she has moved on from her feelings for him.

questions.question: What does Phoebe think is the reason why Rachel is dating Russ?
options: Because he reminds her of Ross
questions.correct_answer: Because he reminds her of Ross
questions.explanation: Phoebe thinks that Rachel is dating Russ because he reminds her of Ross, which is why she is attracted to him.

questions.correct_answer: The Museum of Natural History

Because Russ is a doctor of gums
